title: Are these wipes safe for my Pixel 4 XL?
content:
I bought some wipes from the store. I know that Google informed that you can wipe your phone with 70% isopropyl alcohol, but these wipes contain also all kinds of other chemicals. Here are the ingredients:
Aqua, alcohol denat., isopropyl alcohol, dimethyl glutarate, C9-11 pareth-8, dimethyl succinate, dimethyladipate, PEG-75 lanolin, parfum, DMDM hydantoin, chlorhexidine digluconate, hexylcinnamal, citral, butylphenyl methylpropional, iodopropynylbutylcarbamate
So do you know if this is safe for the Pixel 4 XL and the oleo-phobic coating?
All responses appreciated!
